p:
The 2,2-diphenyl-1-picryl-hydrazyl-hydrate (DPPH) is a generally used method to evaluate the free radical scavenging ability of natural compounds. The free radical scavenging activity of the leaf and rhizome extracts of A. nilgiricum were measured against DPPH
66 . The Ferric reducing antioxidant power assay (FRAP) was used to measure the total antioxidant power from the leaf and rhizome extracts
67 .
